item.title: Contact Me
item.description: I live in Fudan University, Shanghai now. This is a personal website recording my life and study, which is generated by the tool Hugo. Email(preferred): michaelgao0114@gmail.com WeChat: iwilwait

item.title: Main Courses
item.description: UC Berkeley - Fall 2019 EAP Exchange STAT 157 - Causal Inference Seminar (Favorite) A systematic introduction to causal inference and observational studies. MATH C298A - Probability Theory A PhD-level probability course. CS 61B - Data Structures A CS basic course. Fudan University Real Analysis (honor-level) Econometrics Basic Mathematical Statistics I/II; Mathematical Statistics Functional Analysis (upcoming semester) Stochastic Analysis (upcoming semester) Deep Learning (upcoming semester)

item.title: Merry Chrismas
item.description: Merry Chrismas! 祝大家圣诞快乐！
